messages.title: JUST 963 VOTES TO WIN
messages.content: Conservatives and Green Party out of the race in Oxford East. The next election will be a close race between hardworking local campaigner Steve Goddard and the Conservatives. Lib Dem X%, Con Y%, Green Z%.

messages.title: It's Lib Dem or Labour...
messages.content: The next election will be a close race between hardworking local campaigner Steve Goddard and the Conservatives. Labour can’t win here. The only way to stop the Conservatives from winning in Oxford East is to vote for Steve Goddard.

messages.title: Tories on the NHS - the grim truth
messages.content: Key Tory MPs back calls to dismantle NHS.

messages.title: Don't they deserve a fair start in life?
messages.content: Nick Clegg's fair deal for children - An extra £80 million to help improve discipline and raise standards for struggling pupils. - An extra one to one tuition for children from poorer backgrounds. - Abolish university tuition fees for all students.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve Goddard's campaign to protect local services including public toilets, demonstrating the actions against local cuts deemed unnecessary.

Support for the fair deal for children initiative including an increase in funding by £80 million to improve discipline and raise standards for struggling pupils, as well as one to one tuition for children from poorer backgrounds.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race. The only way to stop the Conservatives from winning in Oxford East is to vote for Steve Goddard.

issues.education: Nick Clegg's fair deal for children - An extra £80 million to help improve discipline and raise standards for struggling pupils. - An extra one to one tuition for children from poorer backgrounds. - Abolish university tuition fees for all students.
issues.health: Steve Goddard's campaign to protect local services including public toilets, demonstrating the actions against local cuts deemed unnecessary.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning for local services, standing up to cutbacks and working hard for the area.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST, 27 Park End Street, Oxford, OX1 1YA

images.caption: Steve Goddard pictured with local residents and activists, highlighting community involvement and endorsements.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains a comparison of voting percentages by party, cutting of local services, and strategic voting considerations. References to Labour and Conservative historical figures and decisions to emphasize Lib Dems as a preferable choice.
